title: Best of Comedy Gold Minds
description:
On this episode we’re highlighting some of the best moments from Comedy Gold Minds so far! Featuring Kevin Hart’s conversations with comedy legends Amy Schumer, Russell Peters, and Steve Harvey.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Amy Schumer, Russell Peters, Steve Harvey, Kevin Hart)
